zebra4j

Class QuestionPuzzle

  • java.lang.Object
    • zebra4j.QuestionPuzzle

  • public final class QuestionPuzzle
extends java.lang.Object
    A puzzle that looks for answer to the given question given rules defined by the attribute sets used in the underlying basic puzzle (e.g. all people have different name and the name may be Liza, John or Mary) and a set of Facts known about the people in the puzzle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      QuestionPuzzle(Question question, BasicPuzzle puzzle)
      Creates a new instance by attaching a question to a basic puzzle

      The basic puzzle that defines the constraints to the people and their attributes that question is about.
